item.title: [论文阅读笔记 -- 增量学习] Striking a Balance between Stability-Plasticity for CIL (ICCV 2021)
item.description: Striking a Balance between Stability and Plasticity for Class-Incremental Learning (ICCV 2021) 概述 类增量学习任务 (Class-Incremental Learning, CIL)。 适应新类要求模型具有可塑性 (plasticity)，而不忘记学到的旧类别要求稳定性 (
